machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start Gcode
G90 ;absolute positioning
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} T0 ;Heat bed up to first layer temperature
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T{extruder_nr} ;Set nozzle temperature to first layer temperature
M107 ;start with the fan off
G90
G28
M132 X Y Z A B ;Load Offsets From EEPROM
G1 Z50.000 F420
G161 X Y F3300 ;Move Axes to Maximum
M7 T0
M6 T0
M651
M907 X100 Y100 Z40 A80 B80 ;Digital potentiometer value
M108 T{extruder_nr} ;Select Active Extruder
;Purge line
G1 X-110.00 Y-60.00 F4800
G1 Z{layer_height_0} F420
G1 X-110.00 Y60.00 E17,4 F1200
;Purge line end

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;end gcode
M104 S0 T0
M104 S0 T1
M140 S0 T0
G162 Z F1800
G28 X Y
M652
M132 X Y Z A B
G91
M18
